titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse, August the 5. 1623. By Barten Holyday, now archdeacon of Oxford
titleStmt.author: Holyday, Barten, 1593-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby for Nathaniell Butter, and are to be sold at his shop at Saint Austines Gate in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at Saint Austines Gate in Pauls Church-yard
